        Check the user's SwarmUserInventory to see if it contains a SwarmStoreItem that corresponds to the specified SwarmStoreItem itemId
        Parameters:

      • getItem

        public SwarmStoreItem getItem(int itemId)
        Get the SwarmStoreItem in the user's inventory that has the same itemId as the specified param itemId
        Parameters:
        itemId - The SwarmStoreItem itemId that may (or may not) exist in the user's SwarmUserInventory.
        Returns:
        If the user's inventory contains a SwarmStoreItem with the specifid param itemId, returns a SwarmStoreItem with the specified param itemId. Returns null otherwise.

      • getItemQuantity

        public int getItemQuantity(SwarmStoreItem item)
        Get the quantity of the specified SwarmStoreItem that may (or may not) exist in the user's SwarmUserInventory.
        Parameters:
        item - The SwarmStoreItem that may (or may not) exist the user's SwarmUserInventory.
        Returns:
        Returns the quantity of SwarmStoreItems in the SwarmUserInventory that corresponds to the specified itemId. Returns 0 if the user's SwarmUserInventory does not contain a SwarmStoreItem with the specified param itemId.

      • getItemQuantity

        public int getItemQuantity(int itemId)
        Get the quantity of the specified itemId that may (or may not) exist in the user's SwarmUserInventory.
        Parameters:
        itemId - The itemId number of the SwarmStoreItem that may (or may not) exist the user's SwarmUserInventory.
        Returns:
        Returns the quantity of SwarmStoreItems in the SwarmUserInventory that corresponds to the specified itemId. Returns 0 if the user's SwarmUserInventory does not contain a SwarmStoreItem with the specified param itemId.

      • consumeItem

        public void consumeItem(int itemId)
        Consuming a consumable SwarmStoreItem item will decrease the quantity of the item in the user's SwarmUserInventory by 1. The method will return immediately if the SwarmStoreItem item does not exist, if the SwarmStoreItem item is not consumable, or if the user has less than 1 of the consumable SwarmStoreItem item. If the user has only 1 of the SwarmStoreItem item being consumed, then this method will reduce its quantity to 0 and then remove the SwarmStoreItem item from the user's SwarmUserInventory.
        Parameters:
        itemId - The itemId of the consumable SwarmStoreItem to consume.

      • consumeItem

        public void consumeItem(SwarmStoreItem item)
        Consuming a consumable SwarmStoreItem will decrease the quantity of the item in the user's inventory by 1. The method will return immediately if the item does not exist, if the item is not consumable, or if the user has less than 1 of the consumable SwarmStoreItem item. If the user has only 1 of the SwarmStoreItem item being consumed, then this method will reduce its quantity to 0 and then remove the SwarmStoreItem item from the user's inventory.
        Parameters:
        item - The consumable SwarmStoreItem item to consume.
